entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, who has a dead house-elf and a half-conscious goblin with him.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: A member of the Order, who is trying to get information from Harry.

entities.name: harry's mission
entities.description: The secret mission left by Dumbledore for Harry and his friends.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: A goblin who is half-conscious and has been brought by Harry.

entities.name: hallow
entities.description: An object that is part of the mission.

entities.name: horcrux
entities.description: An object that is part of the mission.

relationships.description: Harry has a secret to share with Bill, but he refuses to tell him.
Harry decides to speak to Griphook first.
Bill is a member of the Order and knows about Harry's mission.
Griphook may be involved with either Hallow or Horcrux.
